nodes.text: The Trade Federation Airbase established by the Trade Federation near the city of Theed was destroyed by the Security Force pilot Gavyn Sykes in 32 BBY late in the Invasion of Naboo.
The Trade Federation Droid Army invaded Naboo in 32 BBY, and this base was established during that time period near the south ridge of Naboo's capital city, Theed.

During a skirmish with a Trade Federation convoy on its way through Widow's Valley, Lieutenant Gavyn Sykes dropped a proton bomb from his bomber on the base, hitting combustible materials and destroying the Airbase utterly.
Lieutenant Sykes dedicated the Airbase's destruction to the Queen of Naboo. At the time of its destruction, the base was preparing for an attack.
This base appears in a mission from the 2000 video game Star Wars: Episode I: Battle for Naboo. The player is asked to destroy the base, but it is not necessary and the game proceeds regardless.
